arm_group.description: manual brushing; Oral-B®, Stages 4, Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro;
electric toothbrush linked; Braun - Oral-B®, D2010K, Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro
off electric toothbrush; Braun - Oral-B®, D2010K, Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro

brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of the present study was to determine the effectiveness of brushing with an electric
      toothbrush switched on and switched off in comparison to manual brushing for the removal of
      dental plaque in children aged four to 16 years with cerebral palsy.

clinical_study.brief_title: Mechanical Control of Plaque in Patients With Cerebral Palsy: A Randomized Clinical Trial

detailed_description.textblock:
Advances in the design and type of movement of electric toothbrushes can determine the
      increase in effectiveness in the control of biofilm by caregivers and patients.There is a
      paucity of studies evaluating the effectiveness of the electric toothbrush compared to
      manual toothbrush specifically in patients with cerebral palsy.Only one study used the
      electric toothbrush in patients with cerebral palsy and demonstrated superiority of the
      electric toothbrush over the manual. However, the study investigated the effect of various
      cleaning strategies on symptoms of gingival inflammation, not specifically focusing on the
      comparison of the efficiency of removal of biofilm from the manual toothbrush and electric
      toothbrush. The primary objective of this study was to evaluate the effectiveness of the
      electric brush on and off the removal of dental plaque in subjects with cerebral palsy
      compared to manual toothbrush. The secondary objective was to characterize the study as
      socioeconomic population.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  medical diagnosis of cerebral palsy

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  who did not complete the cycle three brushings

facility.name: Universidade Federal dos Vales do Jequitinhonha e Mucuri

clinical_study.official_title: Mechanical Control of Plaque in Patients With Cerebral Palsy: A Randomized Clinical Trial

overall_official.affiliation: Federal University of the Valleys of Jequitinhonha and Mucuri

oversight_info.authority: Brazil: National Committee of Ethics in Research

primary_outcome.description:
Before and after brushings were assessed levels of plaque accumulation. For evaluation of the dental plaque index of Quigley-Hein plaque modified Turesky was used.
The escovções were performed by caregivers.
